articles.content:
GENEVA (Reuters) - The World Health Organization (WHO) said on Tuesday that all available evidence suggests the novel coronavirus originated in animals in China late last year and was not manipulated or produced in a laboratory.

articles.title: ‘Another nail in an almost closed coffin’: Trump faces his next coronavirus test - POLITICO
articles.description: Trump’s advisers recognize his bumpy rollout of coronavirus testing represents a major vulnerability in an election year.
articles.content: Just over 4 million tests have been completed so far, for a population of roughly 330 million Americans, amid widespread reports of sick Americans being unable to get tested quickly increasing the odds of spreading the virus. Estimates vary widely even among … [+3879 chars]

articles.title: New Mecklenburg Co model shows curve flattening, some social distancing needed into summer - WBTV
articles.description: New model projections released by Mecklenburg County health officials Monday night suggest some social distancing restrictions will be needed into the summer, even as the curve continues to flatten.
articles.content:
CHARLOTTE, N.C. (WBTV) - New model projections released by Mecklenburg County health officials Monday night suggest some social distancing restrictions will be needed into the summer, even as the curve continues to flatten.

articles.title: Coronavirus in Oregon: 75 now dead as known cases near 2,000, health officials say - OregonLive
articles.description: Oregon health officials said a 45-year-old Marion County man was latest known patient to succumb to COVID-19.
articles.content:
The Oregon Health Authority on Monday reported one new death from the novel coronavirus as confirmed cases climbed to 1,956.
The agency said a 45-year-old Marion County man was the latest known patient to succumb to the illness, bringing the pandemics death … [+3141 chars]
